Author: Elijah Insua

Author: Ben
Comment: Thanks! The file already existed in my install (line 14). If this is the case for anyone else, just edit that line (change audible to none).

Author: Dylan
Comment:
A more direct route would be to issue this command from the msys shell:  
echo “set bell-style none” >> $HOME/.inputrc

Author: Fabian
Comment: Thanks. The beep already tortured by eardrums quite a few times, but not anymore 😉

Author: Bl0ckeduser
Comment: Many thanks. I tried several other things but they didn’t work in MinGW.

Author: Paul
Comment:
This will disable tab-completion for directories for me. If you want to keep the settings you had before, you may do the following

cd $HOME && cp /etc/inputrc ./.inputrc && vim .inputrc

(Replace vim with the editor you prefer.)
